revised_title: Investigations on Captain Kater's Convertible Pendulum and its Reduction to a Vacuum
tldr: Captain Edward Sabine investigates the reduction of Captain Kater's convertible pendulum to a vacuum and finds that the method used by Kater for reducing his experiments was based on erroneous principles. Sabine conducts experiments to determine the actual difference in the number of vibrations of the pendulum in air and highly rarefied air, confirming previous inferences and revealing a greater amount of retardation caused by air than previously computed.
